andromeda.why: Establishing command for group direction is order-making, not liberation/rescue.

arcturus.why: Defines chain of command and basic rules to keep the group coherent—container-first leadership.

draco.why: Early stress can provoke loyalty/status policing to enforce rank.

orion-dark.why: Risk of imposing control/obedience as a shortcut to order (authoritarian tilt).

orion-light.why: Discipline and courage to hold the line while uncertainty tests leadership.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching governance; no sacred-instruction transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Respecting the will of the people ≠ anti-domination rescue mission.

arcturus.why: Functional placement and clean process keep group logic coherent (democratic structure).

draco.why: Projection pressure can spark correctness policing or rank posturing.

orion-dark.why: Can default to procedural rigidity over listening if threatened.

orion-light.why: The honorable trial is to lead by consent—integrity under the people’s gaze.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement and hospitality to voices enable true consensus.

sirius.why: Process leadership without explicit teaching/codification yet.

andromeda.why: Challenging/reshaping authority is internal governance learning, not rescue/extraction.

arcturus.why: Iterates structure under real pressure to find what actually functions.

draco.why: Tension can tip into factional loyalty checks and gatekeeping.

orion-dark.why: Temptation to seize/control the hierarchy when legitimacy feels shaky.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal of leadership: earn authority through tested integrity, not titles.

pleiades.why: Sensitivity to group feedback guides course-correction.

sirius.why: Self-forging of civic stance; no royal-instruction vector yet.

andromeda.why: Stabilizing governance is order-making, not chain-breaking.

arcturus.why: Translates group will into usable roles, procedures, and institutions—clean civic container.

draco.why: Success can attract clique enforcement or rank filters on access.

orion-dark.why: Risk of ossifying protocol into doctrinal obedience.

orion-light.why: Mentoring by steadiness: others face the ordeal of aligning to fair process.

pleiades.why: Relational timing helps procedures be received and adopted.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-governance: codifying fair process teaches civic law by example.

andromeda.why: Being the visible leader is stewardship, not anti-domination rescue.

arcturus.why: Provides a stable cadence and structure the collective can organize around.

draco.why: Authority aura can slip into loyalty policing or favoritism.

orion-dark.why: Projection into ‘the savior’ can calcify into doctrinal control.

orion-light.why: Leadership-by-example under pressure—honor and discipline in the open.

pleiades.why: Attuned care ensures the people feel carried, not coerced.

sirius.why: Royal instruction-by-presence: others learn right governance from your stance.

andromeda.why: Long-view administration isn’t a direct anti-oppression intervention.

arcturus.why: Elder administrator: maintains fair standards, procedures, and civic cadence that endure.

draco.why: Status preservation and gatekeeping can creep in around legacy roles.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine-lock: elevating structure over living consent and review.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: hold integrity and courage as policy meets real life.

pleiades.why: Focus is governance integrity, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Governance sage: teaches the law of fair rule through consistent example and review.
